title: Drupal security advisory (AV25-548)
description: On August 27, 2025, Drupal published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Facets  versions prior to 2.0.10, version 3.0.0 to versions prior to 3.0.1
Synchronize composer.json with Contrib Modules  all versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
